Title: AI Engineer (m/f/d) in B2B SaaS AI Startup
Description:
We are traide AI 🤖, a groundbreaking deep tech, VC-backed, B2B startup powered by AI ( we did AI long before the hype 😉😁) .




Our breakthrough in revenue, with an increase of over 10x in the past year, positions us at the brink of a significant expansion phase🔥. By developing the definitive "global trade compliance intelligence platform", building up around our customs classification engine, fully powered by (artifical-) Intelligence, we’re already transforming the landscape of international trade.




Our product, team, and vision have convinced already prestigious partners like PwC, and our customer base includes industry juggernauts such as Siemens, every day industry Heros like Würth, alongside other notable figures in industry. We are rapidly solidifying our leadership position within the EU while eyeing global expansion 🏆.




AI is deeply embedded in the DNA of our company, reflected in the extensive AI expertise of our founders, the culture within our company and team, and our proven track record of developing and commercializing AI while delivering real business value with AI-centered features 🤖 🧬 . This role aims to strengthen our AI DNA, enabling us to further execute our vision and mission🚀 .




If you are an exceptional individual and feel that you would be a great fit for our compact yet highly skilled team, let us know about you. We would be delighted to hear from you 🤝💡 !


Tasks


As an AI Engineer, you’ll collaborate closely with our product and tech team to develop innovative features that address customer needs and drive business impact. In this role, you'll engage in:





Research & Experimentation: Research and delve into cutting-edge AI techniques, prototype novel ideas, and rigorously validate concepts through experiments and metrics.


End-to-End Development: Transform research insights into production-ready features through careful planning, prototype development, quality assurance, and seamless integration of AI functionalities.


Problem Solving & Innovation: With a curious and analytical mindset, you’ll ask the deeper “why” questions to uncover root problems, explore creative solutions, and bring them to life.


Take a product-focused approach and care about building solutions that are robust, scalable, and easy to use.





While you’ll take on significant responsibility, you’re never alone. You can rely on a supportive team where knowledge-sharing and mutual growth are core values.


Requirements



Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in: Data-Sience, Machine learning, Deeplearning and/or Generative AI & AI-Agents. With a proven track record of developing and deploying AI-driven solutions in production environments.


Strong Software-Engineering OR Data-Science background. Have a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or comparable experience.


Strong analytical, logical reasoning, skills with a creative approach to problem-solving.


Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to changing requirements.


Communication skills, collaborative attitude and ability to work effectively within a diverse team.





Experience with some of these technologies:
- Programming Language: Python (required); Deeplearning Frameworks: pytorch, tensorflow, Other: ML-Ops


Benefits


So, why choose traide AI?




On the product side





Meetings and processes kept to a minimum and focus on getting things done (Kanban Style).


We value clean and well-tested code and ship features only once they are up to standard


Modern tech stack with the opportunity to shape future decisions: React + Chakra-UI, Node.js + GraphQL, Python + Pytorch, LLM/Generative AI and more





In the organization




✔️ traide AI is a place where you can be your authentic self!




✔️ We are creators, not rule followers. In our open culture, ideas take precedence over hierarchies, truth finding is essential 🙌




✔️ Our work culture is flexible and grounded entirely in trust and integrity, where everyone strives to grow & learn




✔️ And the cherry on top? Our offices are the coolest around – our cozy Berlin office is conveniently located at Rosenthaler Platz and offers fantastic lunch spots.




We look forward to receiving your application and getting to know you better 🚀




If you have any questions, just email us.

✔️ We are creators, not rule followers. In our open culture, ideas take precedence over hierarchies, truth finding is essential 🙌


✔️ Our work culture is flexible and grounded entirely in trust and integrity, where everyone strives to grow & learn


✔️ And the cherry on top? Our offices are the coolest around – our cozy Berlin office is conveniently located at Rosenthaler Platz and offers fantastic lunch spots.


We look forward to receiving your application and getting to know you better 🚀


If you have any questions, just email us.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer | Berlin/Hybrid




We are currently hiring a Senior Machine Learning engineer for a leading global technology consultancy that helps businesses unlock their full potential through the power of software, data, and AI. They collaborate with clients to develop and implement innovative solutions that drive measurable business impact.




About the Role:

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Senior Machine Learning Engineer to a team of ML experts. You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and deploying cutting-edge AI/ML solutions for various clients across a diverse range of clients.




Key Responsibilities:

Design, build, and maintain high-performance and scalable ML services.
Develop and maintain ML CI/CD pipelines and workflows.
Train, evaluate, and scale machine learning models.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their needs and design appropriate solutions.
Implement ML pipelines and infrastructure.
Contribute to the latest advancements in AI/ML technologies.




Qualifications:

5+ years of relevant experience in machine learning engineering.
Strong proficiency in Python and experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
Experience with Azure, Docker, GitHub, and Terraform.
Experience with MLOps, CI/CD, and related tooling.
Experience with ETL/ELT and data transformation frameworks (e.g., Spark), and big data solutions (especially Databricks).
Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms.
Experience in stakeholder management and client communication.
Excellent communication and fluent English.




Nice to Have:

Experience in data architecture and database architecture.
Experience with project management using agile methodologies (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Kanban).
Fluency in German.




Benefits:

Opportunities for professional and personal growth through training programs and development initiatives.
Flexible work arrangements, including hybrid work options and remote work opportunities.
Competitive compensation and benefits package.
A supportive and inclusive work environment that values diversity and inclusion.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Protect AI

Protect AI is shaping, defining, and innovating a new category within cybersecurity around the risk and security of AI/ML. Our ML Security Platform enables customers to see, know, and manage security risks to defend against unique AI security threats, and embrace MLSecOps for a safer AI-powered world. This includes a broad set of capabilities including AI supply chain security, Auditable Bill of Materials for AI, ML model scanning, signing, attestation and LLM Security.

Join our team to help us solve this critical need of protecting AI!

Role

Protect AI is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join our growing team in Berlin. Our engineering team builds and operates ‘Protect AI Platform’ covering everything from AI supply chain security and ML Model Scanning to LLM Security. You will work closely with fellow Software Engineers who bring a variety of skillset to the table including Backend, Frontend, Infra, ML and Security Engineering. You will also get opportunity to work closely with Product Managers, Architects and our CTO.

Responsibilities


Build and operate a Machine Learning platform
Design and develop the platform that will enable innovation, delivery, and operation of ML and AI models throughout Protect AI
Collaborate across functions (Product Managers, Engineers, and Researchers) to understand requirements and develop solutions
Act as a technical leader and mentor junior team members
Continuously improve the software development process, including testing, deployment, and monitoring


Qualifications


Significant experience (4+ years) building and maintaining Machine Learning platforms on Cloud and Kubernetes based infrastructure.
Significant experience working with containers and Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and MLOps best practices.
Significant expertise in IaC tools (Terraform).
Expertise in modern Python (type hints, Pydantic, ..) and at least one strongly typed programming language (Go, Java, C#, C++).
Exposure to ML related tools such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, Pandas, Polars, Scikit Learn, and Jupyter.
Exposure to ML research and engineering teams developing, deploying, and operating models.
Strong communication and problem solving skills.
Excited about working in an agile and fast paced environment.


What We Offer


An exciting, collaborative work environment in a fast-growing startup.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and development including attending and presenting technical talks at meetups and conferences.
A culture that values innovation, accountability, and teamwork.
Opportunities to contribute to our open source projects with thousands of Github stars.
Work with a team of talented and well-accomplished peers from AWS, Microsoft and Oracle Cloud.
Work with best in class tools — M2 Macbook Pro, 34” Monitor, modern tech stack and high quality collaboration tools.
No bureaucracy and legacy systems. You are empowered to innovate and do your best work.


Protect AI is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
A company just West of Berlin are seeking a dedicated Senior Python Developer to join their dynamic team.




As a Senior developer, you will guide the cross-functional team, ensuring an agile working style and the adoption of best practices.




You will develop and implement a range of software solutions, contributing to the continuous improvement and stability of their platform using a tech stack that includes Python and TypeScript or React.




Responsibilities

Promote continuous improvement and high-quality software delivery, including effective impediment management.
Develop and maintain key components of our platform, ensuring continuous improvements and operational stability in the user space.
Use Python and/or TypeScript & React to develop robust applications.




Your Profile

A bachelor's degree (higher degrees preferred) in STEM, engineering, or a related field.
Experience as a software developer (3+ years).
Strong understanding of agile principles, values, and practices.
Proficiency in their tech stack, particularly Python and/or TypeScript and their ecosystems.
Proficiency in German (C1 level) is required; English (C1 level) is an advantage.




Why Join this company?

Exciting and diverse tasks with close collaboration in small teams.
A flat hierarchy with open communication channels and direct access to leadership.
Flexible working hours and the option to work from home.
Competitive salary and dedicated time for continuous improvement.




Join this scaling tech company who specialize in artificial intelligence, and programming, to work on innovative solutions in mobility, energy, and AI, and to be part of a team that values self-organization, creativity, and a fun, challenging work environment.




Please apply or send your CV to j.oniah@annapurnarecruitment.com.

Title: Sports Scientist (m/f/x)
Description:
We are currently seeking a highly motivated and passionate individual who is committed to enhancing performance and wellbeing of our clients though data driven guidance. HAGIUS is pleased to offer an exceptional opportunity for a Sport Scientist (m/f/x) to join our dedicated team. With our small team, we provide a unique environment where every contribution is valued, yet our scale is sufficient to have a meaningful impact within the Wellness and Fitness industry.




The ideal candidate will possess a strong desire to assist our clients in achieving their fitness and wellness objectives. If you excel in a dynamic, supportive atmosphere and are keen on collaborating with a team equally committed to health and wellbeing, we invite you to apply.


Tasks



Working in and as part of a team of experts


Conducting personal training sessions and classes


Creating and performing physical assessments (using tools like force plates)


Assessing mental and emotional wellbeing


Analyzing assessment data and setting goals with clients


Creating training plans, schedules, recommendations based on data


Guiding clients through their journey at Hagius


Observing the progress made by clients


Gathering feedback from clients and trainers.


Fine-tune plans depending on progress and assessment data


Ensuring flow of information to the necessary team members



Requirements



Interest in the tasks above


Passion for data-driven fitness guidance


Ability to work as a team player in a team of experts


High-quality education in sports science (University Degree or comparable education)


at least one year work experience in the field of data driven training



Benefits



being part of a passionate team that's striving for honest training with high quality


free participation in classes and usage of facilities





We are looking forward to your application.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)
Description:
Kertos Intro

Kertos is one of the most dynamic and fastest-growing compliance startups in Europe. Backed by leading VCs, renowned business angels, and millions in funding from the European Union for our groundbreaking AI technology, we are perfectly positioned to dominate the rapidly growing compliance market.

With clients like Enpal, Grohe, A&O Hostels, and Blacklane, leading companies rely on our innovative platform. The compliance market is growing at 20% annually, and with upcoming regulations like the AI Act, NIS2, and DORA, we are ideally placed to become the European market leader.

At Kertos, we’re not just writing a unique growth story; we also have the rare opportunity to actively shape one of Europe’s core industries. Join our team and help us shape the future of compliance!

Your purpose at Kertos

You are part of our AI Squad at Kertos, pushing the boundaries of automation and innovation of our platform. As Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll lead the way in advancing machine learning, integrating cutting-edge models and frameworks to bring LLM-based features to life. From designing and contributing to our models and pipelines to ensuring seamless deployment throughout the product lifecycle, you’ll have a huge impact on the future of our company.

What You’ll Be Doing Here


Contribute to product development: bring in your ideas and automate workflows, improve suggestions and increase user satisfaction even further
Develop technical concepts and approaches across the whole development lifecycle
Combine machine learning models and our platform to bring actual values right to the users’ fingertips
Integrate MLOps principles and tools that help you and your team for development
Make sure the developed models work as expected in our production environments in a secure and stable way
Be creative in acquiring new data automatically to enhance our models and systems


The Skills, Motivation, And Mentality You Should Bring


You have extensive professional experience in building scalable web applications
You have hands-on expertise in MLOps, including deployment, automation, and monitoring, to bring models to production
Experience with knowledge graphs and/or NLP and embeddings isa big plus
You constantly challenge our status quo, love to spark innovation and strive to grow with us, as a team
You are a strong communicator and have excellent collaboration abilities to effectively work in cross-functional, agile teams


Why Kertos


Number one: Build the foundation of various AI-driven use cases for the Kertos platform
Best of both worlds: As this is a research project, you will get both the benefits of research and using the newest technologies as well as startup culture
You are Kertos: Don’t like something? Could be done better? You have the freedom to push things forward and contribute to making Kertos a great place to work
Unique opportunity: Join the growing team of one of Europe’s most promising early stages companies and to work directly with our CTO and co-founder Alex
European funding in the millions: The EU has funded our AI research with a total of over 2 million euros
Regular Feedback: We foster an open feedback culture and support your growth with regular 1-on-1 meetings
Keep growing: To boost your professional and personal growth, we provide you with a Personal Development Budget of 1.500€ per year
Mental Health matters: We've partnered with nilo to prioritize your well-being, offering personalized mental health support for all employees
For Sports Enthusiasts: We subsidize your Wellpass membership for your physical fitness for a better work-life balance
Full flexibility: Whether at our Munich headquarters, Berlin office or home office - we are flexible and you are happy!
Cutting Edge Technology: Leading VCs have invested in our vision to revolutionize how data protection management and compliance measures are handled sustainably
Steep learning curve: With us you get full responsibility from day 1, push topics forward independently and thus learn a lot
Strong onboarding: No idea about compliance and its automation? No problem, we'll turn you into an expert and provide you with an onboarding buddy
Teamwork Makes the Dream Work: We are a strong team that supports each other, and we also have a lot of fun together beyond work and across different locations


Sounds like you are the one we’ve been looking for?

Perfect, let's have a chat! Just send in your CV. We are excited to meet you soon.

In case you have any questions, feel free to reach out to Lena from our People & Culture team. She's happy to answer all your questions.

About Us

Founded in 2021 and backed by investors such as 10x Founders, Seed + Speed, and xdeck, we are on a rapid growth trajectory. Today, we are a team of over 45 ambitious talents from 15 nations, united by our mission to transform compliance from a challenge into a seamless standard. With our platform, we help companies implement regulatory requirements effortlessly, cost-effectively, and stress-free. From our offices in Berlin and Munich, we are driving this vision forward – and this is just the beginning.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (d/f/m) - Large-scale Machine Learning
Description:
Why us?

We believe that AI has the potential to revolutionize how cancer and other complex diseases are diagnosed and treated. We also believe that AI is a tool, not an identity – without access to high quality data and a scientifically rigorous, transparent approach to model development, AI is just a buzzword. That’s where we come in.

Aignostics is a spin-off from one of Europe's largest and most prestigious university hospitals (Charité), with employees in Berlin and New York. We have received over $50M in funding from leading investors and are a growing team of over 100 interdisciplinary professionals. We work with academic partners as well as leading global life sciences companies.

As a Senior Data Scientist in Aignostic's foundation model team you will work on our self-supervised base models. Together with collaborators in academia and industry you will push the state of the art in large-scale machine learning for digital pathology. Within our team of experts on large-scale machine learning and data handling, you will work on improving, benchmarking and extending our family of best-in-class foundations models, bridging image, text and other pathology data modalities. Moreover, using our foundation models you will contribute to developing prototypes for new applications to assist pathologists and generate new insights for improving cancer treatment.

At Aignostics, we believe that fighting cancer is a job for people of all identities, backgrounds, and cultures. We value and celebrate diversity and inclusion and are committed to offering equal employment and promotion opportunities for all applicants and employees. Applicants will be considered regardless of their age, disability, ethnicity, race, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, etc. We thrive through collaboration and believe the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

Where your expertise is needed


Plan and execute interdisciplinary projects connecting machine learning, software engineering and biomedical domain knowledge
Research, pilot and evaluate novel computer vision approaches for extracting insight from high-resolution biological images
Transform proof-of-concept machine learning models into automated, tested and production-ready systems
Support and mentor junior colleagues
Clearly communicate your results in internal and external presentations


What We Are Looking For


Ph.D or MSc. in a relevant field, e.g. Computer Science, Machine Learning or Bioinformatics
Eagerness to lead initiatives, learn new technologies and excel in a complex space
Solid theoretical foundations and several years of experience developing novel machine learning techniques
Experience with developing large-scale self-supervised deep learning models ("Foundation Models") for vision or language applications
Advanced skills in Python, Linux, cloud computing and machine learning software stacks
Passion for clean code and high standards for quality assurance
Ability to independently define, organize and complete research projects
Excellent communication and team working skills


Bonus points for


Exposure to biomedical data
Leadership experience in a research context
Hands-on experience with developing and integrating Vision Language Models (VLMs)
Experience in considering Information Security criteria under ISO 27001


We are still keen to hear from you if you don't match all the above points! Our needs are diverse and growing and you are encouraged to apply if you have any combination of these skills. The recruitment process is a comparative exercise and decisions will be made based on the applications we review at each time.

Our offer


Join a purpose-driven start up: We are working collectively to fight cancer and improve patient outcomes. Come help us make a difference!
Cutting-edge AI research and development, with involvement of Charité, TU Berlin and our other partners
Work with a welcoming, diverse and highly international team of colleagues
Opportunity to take responsibility and grow your role within the startup
Expand your skills by benefitting from our Learning & Development yearly budget of 1,000€ (plus 2 L&D days), language classes and internal development programs
Mentoring program, you’ll learn from great experts
Flexible working hours and teleworking policy
Enjoy your well-deserved time off within our 28 paid vacations days per year
We are family & pet friendly and support flexible parental leave options
Pick a subsidized membership of your choice among public transport sports and well-being
Enjoy our social gatherings, lunches, and off-site events for a fun and inclusive work environment


Join us to make a difference!

About Us

aignostics.com
Show more

  • Experience in considering Information Security criteria under ISO 27001

We are still keen to hear from you if you don't match all the above points! Our needs are diverse and growing and you are encouraged to apply if you have any combination of these skills. The recruitment process is a comparative exercise and decisions will be made based on the applications we review at each time.

Our offer

  • Join a purpose-driven start up: We are working collectively to fight cancer and improve patient outcomes. Come help us make a difference!
  • Cutting-edge AI research and development, with involvement of Charité, TU Berlin and our other partners
  • Work with a welcoming, diverse and highly international team of colleagues
  • Opportunity to take responsibility and grow your role within the startup
  • Expand your skills by benefitting from our Learning & Development yearly budget of 1,000€ (plus 2 L&D days), language classes and internal development programs
  • Mentoring program, you’ll learn from great experts
  • Flexible working hours and teleworking policy
  • Enjoy your well-deserved time off within our 28 paid vacations days per year
  • We are family & pet friendly and support flexible parental leave options
  • Pick a subsidized membership of your choice among public transport sports and well-being
  • Enjoy our social gatherings, lunches, and off-site events for a fun and inclusive work environment

Join us to make a difference!

About Us

aignostics.com

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
KAYAK, part of Booking Holdings (NASDAQ: BKNG), is the world’s leading travel search engine. With billions of queries across our platforms, we help people find their perfect flight, stay, rental car and vacation package. We’re also transforming business travel with a new corporate travel solution, KAYAK for Business.

As an employee of KAYAK, you will be part of a travel company that operates a portfolio of global metasearch brands including momondo, Cheapflights and HotelsCombined, among others. From start-up to industry leader, innovation is in our DNA and every employee has an opportunity to make their mark. Our focus is on building the best travel search engine to make it easier for everyone to experience the world.

The Marketing Measurement team's mission is to improve KAYAK's ability to measure the efficiency of marketing efforts. This role works closely with marketing leaders to make better data-informed strategic marketing decisions.

As a Senior Data Scientist on this team, you will have the opportunity to develop the frameworks and roadmaps to tackle marketing measurement challenges in an efficient way, work with the stakeholders to align on priorities, and closely work your team to build the robust measurement and experimentation solutions!

In this role, you will:



Manage into end to end experimentation from formulating hypotheses, experiment design to collecting right data, doing power analysis to finally then implementing and analyzing experiment results
Support in the initiatives towards building a robust framework for efficiently creating and evaluating creative, bidding and landing page experiments
Develop new models and advanced analytics techniques to measure and optimize the marketing spend in a robust manner
Support the development of less senior scientists, collaborates with team members to assure timely delivery of high-quality work
Build standardized and scalable solutions, and lead from front in setting up the best practices



Please apply if you have:



Advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in Data Science, Statistics or a related field.
Extensive experience with data manipulation and extraction using relational databases (SQL)
Ability to write high quality, scalable, maintainable code (Python, R)
Strong story-telling and presentation skills to understand and communicate in the language of business partners, mostly within Marketing
Strong foundation in experimentation methods and causal inference techniques
Experienced in marketing science measurement methodologies like Causal impact, geo-lift on Google, and Marketing mix models
Proactive work style, needing minimal guidance and demonstrating good judgment
Has a keen sense of success criteria and demonstrates success through end-to-end QA. Independently adheres to strong testing and validation principles
Passionate about large data sets in marketing, finance, and economics. Skilled in paid marketing data, time-series analysis, econometrics, and regression models



Benefits:



Work from (almost) anywhere for up to 20 days per year
Focus on mental health and well-being:

Company-paid therapy sessions through SpringHealth
Company-paid subscription to HeadSpace
Company-wide week off a year - the whole team fully recharges (and returns without a pile-up of work!)
No meeting Fridays

Paid parental leave
Generous paid vacation + time off for your birthday
Paid volunteer time
Focus on your career growth:

Development Dollars
Leadership development
Access to thousand of on-demand e-learnings

Travel Discounts
Employee Resource Groups
6 weeks paid vacation
Free lunch 2 days per week
Pension plan contributions
Public transportation subsidies
Bike leasing program
Monthly social events, massages, Thursday happy hours, sports teams
An awesome office in Friedrichshain, Berlin


Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

At OpenTable/KAYAK, we aspire to be a workplace that fosters inclusion and reflects the diverse communities we serve. Hiring people with different backgrounds and perspectives is critical to innovation and to how we deliver great experiences for our users, partners, and teams. We strive to be an open and welcoming environment so that no matter who you are, you can be yourself.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform job responsibilities, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation(s).

Title: React Native Entwickler (m/w/d)
Description:
About

Das Unternehmen

Die Heizung spinnt? Die Klingel ist kaputt? Das Licht bleibt aus? Nichts ist ärgerlicher als eine notwendige Reparatur in der eigenen Wohnung. B&O Service bringt das in Ordnung. Und das rund um die Uhr. Wir sind spezialisiert auf die Instandhaltung und Wohnungsmodernisierung und sind damit einer der wichtigsten Player in der Wohnungswirtschaft und Marktführer für Handwerksleistungen. Als Komplettanbieter übernehmen wir alle technischen Dienstleistungen von der Instandhaltung von Mietwohnungen über die Wohnungsmodernisierung und Wartung bis zur Beseitigung von Versicherungsschäden. Derzeit verantworten wir diese Leistungen in über 600.000 Wohnungen für privatwirtschaftliche und kommunale Wohnungsunternehmen deutschlandweit und beheben damit 1 Million Schäden pro Jahr. Diese hohe Zahl an Aufträgen lässt sich nur bewältigen, weil wir neben den 1.000 eigenen Handwerkenden mit knapp 1.000 ausgewählten Handwerksunternehmen zusammenarbeiten. Ein Profi-Netzwerk, das aufgrund des kontinuierlichen Wachstums ständig weiter ausgebaut wird.

Wir bei B&O wollen mit smarten digitalen Lösungen dazu beitragen, Ressourcen möglichst verantwortungsvoll zu nutzen und die technologische Entwicklung und Digitalisierung in der Industrie voranzutreiben.

Hierfür sind wir auf der Suche nach einem erfahrenen

React Native Entwickler (m/w/d)

in einem hybriden Arbeitsmodell für unseren Standort in Berlin.

Was Dich Erwartet

Du konzipierst und entwickelst unsere mobilen Applikationen mit React Native

Du treibst mit uns das Roll-out bestehender Android-Apps auf iOS voran

Du übernimmst die Themen Performance-Optimierung und Debugging für eine optimale Nutzererfahrung

Du stellst eine hohe Codequalität durch Tests, Code-Reviews und Dokumentationen sicher

Du feilst an der Entwicklung und Implementierung neuer Features auf Grundlage von Nutzer- und Marktanforderungen

Du arbeitest in agilen Teams zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung unserer Produkte

Womit Du Uns Begeisterst

Du hast ein abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik, Informatik oder eine vergleichbare Qualifikation oder verfügst über entsprechende Berufserfahrung

Du verfügst über sehr gute Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung mobiler Applikationen mit React Native, idealerweise bringst du bereits Erfahrungen mit nativer Entwicklung in Swift, Objective-C, Java oder Kotlin mit

Du besitzt erste Erfahrungen in der Entwicklung von mobilen Applikationen für iOS

Du kennst dich mit der Integration von APIs und Drittanbieter-Services aus

Du bist geübt im Umgang mit Tools wie Git, CI/CD-Pipelines und Test-Frameworks für React Native

Du arbeitest selbstständig und strukturiert und verfügst über eine hohe Problemlösungskompetenz

Was du von uns erwarten darfst

Sicherheit: Eine unbefristete Einstellung in einem krisensicheren Umfeld sowie eine pünktliche Gehaltszahlung sind für uns selbstverständlich.

Erholung: Bei uns erhältst du 30 Tage Erholungsurlaub und Urlaubsgeld. Für besondere Anlässe bekommst du zusätzliche freie Tage.

Wohlfühlen: Mit unserer digitalen und mobilen Zeiterfassung profitierst du von maximaler Freiheit für eine gute Work-Life-Balance. Hol dir deinen täglichen Ausgleich mit einem JobRad – oder nutze unsere Kooperation mit Urban Sports Club und EGYM WELLPASS.

Kindergartenzuschuss: Die Vereinbarkeit von Familie und Beruf ist uns wichtig. Deswegen unterstützen wir dich monatlich mit einem steuerfreien Betrag in Höhe von 100,00 Euro für Kinderbetreuungseinrichtungen wie Kindertagesstätten oder Kindergärten.

Weiterentwicklung: Mit einem auf dich zugeschnittenen Entwicklungsplan und regelmäßigen Feedbackgesprächen kannst du dich persönlich und fachlich vollkommen entfalten.

Ein besonderes Hotelerlebnis: Erlebe einmal im Jahr zusammen mit deiner Familie unsere besonderen Angebote im B&O Parkhotel in Bad Aibling.

Haben wir dein Interesse geweckt? Dann lass uns gerne deinen Lebenslauf über unser Online-Formular zukommen. Wir freuen uns darauf, dich kennenzulernen!

B&O Service Berlin GmbH

Ansprechpartner: Jens Brennenstuhl

Tel.: +49 806 14 95 04 02

E-Mail: bewerbung@boservice.de

Bewerberhotline: 0800 49 500 60

WhatsApp: +49 151 55 07 07 07

www.bo-gruppe.de

Nice-to-have skills


React Native
Swift
Objective-C
Java
Kotlin
API Integration
Git
Berlin, Berlin, Germany


Work experience


Mobile
Mobile Engineering


Languages


German

Title: Software Engineer (Junior-Senior) (m/f/d)
Description:
About

About GamerProfiles

GamerProfiles is the Social Media for Gamers. Share and connect with gamers across all games. It's free, secure, and works on your desktop and phone. Read more on GamerProfiles.com.

GamerProfiles.com – Software Engineer (Junior-Senior) (m/f/d)

Full-time


On-site
Berlin, Germany
GamerProfiles.com (GP 9000 GmbH) E-Mail: engineering-jobs(at)gamerprofiles.com


Responsibilities

Build the best social media for gamers! Allow gamers to share and connect with gamers across all games.

Work as a fullstack engineer on all areas of the product.

Work in a small, powerful team of smart engineers.

Work with a modern tech-stack.

Optimize internal KPIs, processes, best practices, and quality standards.

You also promote our shared values and vision (excellent user experience, attention to detail, product quality, teamwork).

Requirements

Degree in computer science or similar

Fluent in English

You like online games (you don't have to be a Pro Gamer, but you've gamed at least casually for some time)

1+ years work experience, 4+ years work experience for the senior role

Interest in our current tech stack: React, CSS, HTML, Node.js, Next.js, Nest.js, Flutter, Firebase, Tailwind, MongoDB, Google Cloud

You like office culture: We are big believers in the power of collaborating, problem-solving, mutual exchange, and celebrating wins in person. Thus, we are working in the office together.

High quality standards and attention to detail

Good attitude and teamwork capability

Strong work ethic, organizational and communication skill

You want to improve yourself, and help others to improve

You take your job seriously and always do your best, but also have fun with what you do

You're a team player who values cooperation, efficiency and harmony, but also points out issues and solves them

Benefits

Ideal workplace: attractive salary, beautiful office in the heart of Berlin, daily team lunches on the house via Wolt

Personal development potential: work with experienced colleagues, learn from them and share knowledge with them

Agile and creative startup with quick decision making + the stability and support of being financed by top investors

Value based culture: we value excellent user experience, attention to detail, product quality and teamwork

Impact on the gaming world: be part of an amazing story, create value for the global gaming community

Healthy team size: ~10 colleagues

Interview process in 3 stages


Video interview, 2) Video interview with tech case, 3) Interview in the office


Sounds good? Then send us:

CV and GitHub (if existing)

We look forward to your application! Send it to engineering-jobs(at)gamerprofiles.com.

GamerProfiles is an equal opportunity employer. We strive to create an inclusive work environment for all employees, and everyone here is committed to ensuring that GamerProfiles is representative of a world in which we want to live and play.

Nice-to-have skills


React
CSS
HTML
Node.JS
Next.js
Flutter
Firebase
MongoDB
Berlin, Berlin, Germany


Work experience


Fullstack


Languages


German

Title: Staff Data Scientist - Ad Tech
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are looking for Staff Data Scientists (all genders) to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

You will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.

At Delivery Hero, AdTech introduces people to new food they love and enables our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. We have developed a range of products to offer advertising solutions for restaurants helping them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across over 50 countries around the clock, our Ad Tech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, Ad Tech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero; our data science team is at the heart of this growth, powering personalisation, relevance, and recommendation.

The Ad Tech data science team operates within the wider Vendor Data tribe whose mission is to drive innovation, insight-driven decision making and to solve business problems through a culture of excellence and openness. The tribe comprises teams of skilled analysts, engineers, and scientists working together to deliver data solutions covering a host of business opportunities across all of Delivery Hero’s 70+ markets.

If you're a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!


Spearhead a revolution of Ad Tech at Delivery Hero through the innovative application of cutting edge tools and techniques such as neural networks and reinforcement learning covering areas such as ad ranking, bidding strategies, and ad pacing driving unparalleled improvements in advertising campaigns.
Analyse large-scale datasets to understand and identify opportunities deploying sophisticated statistical techniques to improve ad relevance, click-through rates, and conversion metrics.
Lead research initiatives to explore emerging trends and technologies in AdTech and machine learning, contributing to the advancement of Delivery Hero's advertising products and algorithms. Remain at the forefront of industry and research developments incorporating new methodologies and best practices into our data science workflows and models.
Serve as a subject matter expert in data science and machine learning, providing guidance and mentorship to other team members and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data science team.


What you need to be successful


You are an industry-leading talent at modelling business problems using machine learning techniques covering feature engineering, model selection and design as well as evaluation and optimisation to deliver enormous value to the business.
You raise the performance of other team members through effective and mature mentorship and constructive collaboration to benefit others from your deep understanding and experience of data science.
You have extensive expertise in building and training complex neural network models with strong knowledge of the Python data toolkit centering around deep learning i.e. Keras and ideally Tensorflow and TFX
Through the seamless use of SQL queries you are able to explore our data universe and gather data to support your analysis and the development of machine learning solutions.
You write clean, production-level code and are able to effectively set up your environment to minimise testing loops influencing the entire team to work more efficiently and reliably.
You are familiar with deploying and developing complex neural networks to serve live traffic and experience collaborating with ML engineers in cloud systems, ideally GCP.
You love to learn, are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from a variety of teams in a diverse environment.


Nice to have:


Implementing neural networks to specifically solve Ad Tech challenges would be highly desirable.


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

HTML:
About The Opportunity

We are looking for Staff Data Scientists (all genders) to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

You will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.

At Delivery Hero, AdTech introduces people to new food they love and enables our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. We have developed a range of products to offer advertising solutions for restaurants helping them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across over 50 countries around the clock, our Ad Tech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, Ad Tech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero; our data science team is at the heart of this growth, powering personalisation, relevance, and recommendation.

The Ad Tech data science team operates within the wider Vendor Data tribe whose mission is to drive innovation, insight-driven decision making and to solve business problems through a culture of excellence and openness. The tribe comprises teams of skilled analysts, engineers, and scientists working together to deliver data solutions covering a host of business opportunities across all of Delivery Hero’s 70+ markets.

If you're a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!

  • Spearhead a revolution of Ad Tech at Delivery Hero through the innovative application of cutting edge tools and techniques such as neural networks and reinforcement learning covering areas such as ad ranking, bidding strategies, and ad pacing driving unparalleled improvements in advertising campaigns.
  • Analyse large-scale datasets to understand and identify opportunities deploying sophisticated statistical techniques to improve ad relevance, click-through rates, and conversion metrics.
  • Lead research initiatives to explore emerging trends and technologies in AdTech and machine learning, contributing to the advancement of Delivery Hero's advertising products and algorithms. Remain at the forefront of industry and research developments incorporating new methodologies and best practices into our data science workflows and models.
  • Serve as a subject matter expert in data science and machine learning, providing guidance and mentorship to other team members and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data science team.

What you need to be successful

  • You are an industry-leading talent at modelling business problems using machine learning techniques covering feature engineering, model selection and design as well as evaluation and optimisation to deliver enormous value to the business.
  • You raise the performance of other team members through effective and mature mentorship and constructive collaboration to benefit others from your deep understanding and experience of data science.
  • You have extensive expertise in building and training complex neural network models with strong knowledge of the Python data toolkit centering around deep learning i.e. Keras and ideally Tensorflow and TFX
  • Through the seamless use of SQL queries you are able to explore our data universe and gather data to support your analysis and the development of machine learning solutions.
  • You write clean, production-level code and are able to effectively set up your environment to minimise testing loops influencing the entire team to work more efficiently and reliably.
  • You are familiar with deploying and developing complex neural networks to serve live traffic and experience collaborating with ML engineers in cloud systems, ideally GCP.
  • You love to learn, are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
  • You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from a variety of teams in a diverse environment.

Nice to have:

  • Implementing neural networks to specifically solve Ad Tech challenges would be highly desirable.

Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.

  • Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
  • We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
  • We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
  • Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
  • Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
  • The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.

Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Title: Data Scientist – NLP & Large Language Models – Gestalte die Zukunft intelligenter Datenlösungen
Description:
Data Scientist – NLP & Large Language Models– Gestalte die Zukunft intelligenter Datenlösungen




Mein Kunde ist ein führendes Unternehmen im Bereich Normung, Standardisierung und digitale Informationsverarbeitung. Ihre Mission ist es, Unternehmen, Forschungseinrichtungen und die öffentliche Hand mit zuverlässigen, strukturierten und hochqualitativen Normeninformationen zu versorgen. Dabei spielen moderne Technologien, innovative Softwarelösungen und leistungsstarke Datenbanken eine zentrale Rolle.




Das Team aus Experten entwickelt und betreibt hochmoderne Plattformen, die einen effizienten Zugang zu technischen Standards ermöglichen. Sie setzen auf eine offene, kollaborative Unternehmenskultur, in der neue Ideen gefördert und technologische Innovationen aktiv vorangetrieben werden.




Deine Mission

Als Data Scientist (m/w/d) mit Fokus auf Natural Language Processing (NLP) und Large Language Models (LLM) arbeitest Du an innovativen Lösungen, die KI-basierte Sprachverarbeitung auf das nächste Level heben. Du entwickelst und implementierst modernste Algorithmen und setzt LLMs für reale Anwendungen produktiv ein.







Deine Aufgaben

Modellentwicklung & Produktivsetzung – Du trainierst, optimierst und implementierst NLP- und LLM-Modelle für vielfältige Anwendungen.
Innovative KI-Anwendungen – Du erforschst neue Möglichkeiten für den Einsatz von NLP & LLMs in realen Geschäftsprozessen.
Technische Umsetzung – Planung, Installation und Betrieb von Open-Source-LLMs sowie Entwicklung von Webanwendungen und APIs zur Integration in bestehende Systeme.
Projektleitung & Zusammenarbeit – Du übernimmst Verantwortung in Projekten, arbeitest mit KI-Expert*innen zusammen und bringst Dein Know-how in interne Netzwerke ein.







Dein Profil

Studium in Statistik, Data Science, Mathematik, Informatik oder verwandten Bereichen
Fundiertes Wissen in NLP und LLMs – Du kennst Dich mit modernen KI-Architekturen aus
Python-Expertise im Data-Science-Umfeld
Kenntnisse in Git, Docker, Cloud-Technologien und Software-Entwicklung







Die Benefits

Maximale Flexibilität: 35-Stunden-Woche mit Option auf bis zu 42 Stunden
Mehr Freizeit: 30 Urlaubstage + Betriebsferien zwischen Weihnachten und Neujahr
Top-Standort: Zentral gelegen mit modernem Büro in Berlin
Gesundheit & Wohlbefinden: Kostenlose Physiotherapie, JobRad, Firmenticket-Zuschuss







Klingt spannend? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt und werde Teil eines Teams, das NLP & KI-Innovationen in die Praxis bringt!

Show more

Title: Principal Data Scientist - Ad Tech
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are on the lookout for a Principal Data Scientist to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

As part of our Vendor Team, you’ll be the driving force behind the success of thousands of restaurants, shops, and local businesses. Your contributions will empower vendors with advanced tools to manage their operations, boosting their visibility, and reach. Every feature you help build will create growth opportunities for businesses of all sizes, strengthening Delivery Hero’s ecosystem and impact.

We are using AdTech to introduce people to new food they love and to enable our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. a range of products that we have developed to offer advertising solutions for restaurants, which help them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across about 70 countries around the clock, our AdTech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, AdTech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero; our innovative tech and product offering is the backbone of that development.

In this role, you will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.


Work on one of the most exciting topics at Delivery Hero with significant top management attention
Drive transformative innovation in AI-powered ranking and bidding systems for digital advertising
Define and own the direction of data science models for our new adtech products to ensure they are built for our future needs
Lead the creation of advanced models and strategies that redefine auction dynamics, maximise advertiser ROI, and deliver exceptional user experiences
As an expert and visionary, you will elevate our advertising intelligence capabilities, setting new industry benchmarks while shaping the future of data-driven decision-making at scale.


What you need to be successful


Deep Learning Expertise: Extensive experience designing, training, and deploying large-scale neural network architectures.
Scalable Systems: Proven ability to work with distributed systems and frameworks for scaling AI models (eg TensorFlow or PyTorch).
Optimisation Skills: Expert knowledge of hyperparameter tuning, loss function selection, and efficient training techniques for high-throughput environments.
Ad-Tech Experience: Expertise with advertising KPIs, user intent prediction, ranking, and auction dynamics.
Data Science Foundations: Advanced understanding of statistical modelling, causal inference, and managing data layers.
Leadership Abilities: Strong collaboration and mentorship skills to be a company-wide thought leader with a developed ability to communicate research outcomes effectively to stakeholders.


Nice-to-Haves:


Expertise in econometrics or game theory as applied to auction and pricing strategies.
Contributions to open-source AI tools or publications in top-tier machine learning conferences.
Knowledge of calibration techniques (eg Platt scaling, isotonic regression) to ensure prediction reliability.
Familiarity with transformer-based architectures or graph neural networks for complex data interactions.


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
We will support you in developing yourself and your career growth opportunities: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support and access to the Udemy Business platform to explore a variety of online courses.
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts. Courses.


Ready to join our team? If you’re excited to grow, collaborate and be part of the world’s leading delivery platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today!

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application.
